item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes https://github.com/kubernetes/kubeadm https://github.com/kubernetes/kops https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/kubespray kubernetes简称k8s, 是开源的容器编排工具。 安装单机版k8s: minikube 安装k8s集群: kubeadm (k8s内置的，类似于docker swarm.) kops
